title: Foundation Models for Clinical Records at Health System Scale
details: HR Rajamohan, X Gao, W Zhu, SL Huang, L Chen… - 1st ICML Workshop on Foundation …
abstract: Large-scale pretraining has transformed modeling of language and other data types, but its potential remains underexplored in healthcare with structured electronic health records (EHRs). We present a novel generative pretraining strategy for …
